the mother came home and asked the kids what they wanted to eat for dinner .
and they said Mcdonalds .
so she drove them to the nearest Mcdonalds .
and the mother and the boy knew what they wanted to eat .
but the girl didn't .
and boy ordered a hamburger fries and a chocolate shake .
and the mother wanted a salad .
the girl finally made up her mind and wanted a happy meal with a milkshake .
the clerk said it was twelve dollars .
and the mother reached for her purse .
but it wasn't there .
a boy wakes up from school gets out of bed and makes himself some breakfast .
he accidentally pours the milk over his bowl while looking at the clock .
when he ties his shoes one of the laces break .
when he's ready he's tryin(g) to catch the school bus .
but he doesn't catch it .
he walks to school late .
and the teacher tells him what time it is .
one day a boy and a girl were going to the park .
all of a sudden when they were behind the bushes they saw a alien ship come down that had blinking lights .
they peeked out from behind the bushes and saw an alien family walk out .
their family had blue spots and purple .
they also had very many legs and a dog .
the girl wanted to go ask them some questions .
but the boy hold her hand back .
until that day nobody will believe them that they saw aliens .
but they will know that they did .
the end .
